version_description:
- Fixes bug of subscriptions uploads disorder.
- minor bug fixes & stability improvements.

We love to hear your feedback, so keep reviewing :)

- Remove background playback as per YouTube request.
- "Sleep mode" users now can enjoy Tuber add free.

New in Tuber 7:

- Queue videos (add videos to queue on the fly without needing to sign in).
- Pro mode (enjoy all features for a di

- New design.
- Enhanced functionality.
- Removed Ads for all users.
- iPhone X support.

- Fixed Home page issues.
- Added iOS13 dark mode support.
